japanese: 誰かに教えてもらう/下手も個性/練習あるのみ
english: Have someone teach/ Bad is also personality/ Only practice

japanese: 英雄先生にピッタリの趣味ですね/人は見かけによらないですね/『深山幽谷』って感じですね
english: Perfect hobby for Eiyu-sensei/ Don't judge by appearance/ Feels like 'deep mountains'

japanese: 話がある。/少し付き合わないか？
english: I have something to say. /Come with me?

japanese: 部室棟も、/いつもとは違う活気で溢れてるわね。
english: The club room building /is full of different energy than usual.

japanese: 進路指導室へよく来たな！/ここでは必殺技の種類を/ごっそり変更できるぞ！！
english: Welcome to Career Guidance Room! /Here you can change /special move types wholesale!!

japanese: 部室が狭いから、壁をぶち壊して/となりのバレー部の部室も/テニス部用にする用意をしてるんですぅ！
english: Club room is small, so breaking the wall /to make volleyball club room next door /tennis club's too!

japanese: 英雄先生、捜し物ですか？
english: Eiyu-sensei, looking for something?

japanese: 誰かに会いたい時は、/そういう事を考えていると/出会いやすいかもね。
english: When you want to meet someone, /thinking about it /makes encounters easier.

japanese: 誰だって後輩に慕われて、/悪い気はしないしね。
english: Anyone would be happy /to be admired by underclassmen.

japanese: 走って移動したり、/パラメータが増えるマスに止まったり、/戦闘に負けると減り……、
english: Running to move, or /stopping on parameter up spaces, or /losing battles decreases it...

japanese: 進路指導室に止まった
english: Stopped at Career Guidance Room

japanese: 英雄先生、何悩んでるんですか？
english: Eiyu-sensei, what are you worried about?

japanese: 認めよう！
english: I acknowledge it!

japanese: 購買部へいらっしゃい。/よく来たわね。
english: Welcome to the school store. /Good to see you.

japanese: 誰に戦闘をしかけますか？
english: Who will you challenge to battle?

japanese: 買ったんじゃなくて、もらったのよ。/後輩や他のクラスの女の子たちに！
english: Didn't buy, got it as a gift. /From underclassmen and other class girls!

japanese: 足りねぇ……/この学園祭、何かが足りねぇ！！
english: Not enough... /this festival, something's missing!!

japanese: 誰だって後輩に慕われて、/悪い気はしないんじゃないかな？
english: Anyone would be happy /to be admired by underclassmen, right?

japanese: 誰の!c05友好度!c07を上げますか？
english: Whose !c05Friendship!c07 will you raise?

japanese: 誰の!c05友好度!c07を下げますか？
english: Whose !c05Friendship!c07 will you lower?

japanese: 覇気が足りない/予算が足りない/これで十分
english: Lack spirit/ Lack budget/ This is enough

japanese: 誰に使いますか？
english: Who will you use it on?

japanese: 誰の!c04機嫌!c07を悪くしますか？
english: Whose !c04mood!c07 will you worsen?

japanese: 購買部に止まった
english: Stopped at school store

japanese: 足りないといえば、/予算が足りないですよ！！/もうちょっとあれば色々出来たのに……
english: If something's lacking, /it's budget!! /With a bit more I could do things...

japanese: 見てよ、九郎。/プールに金魚が泳いでるよ。
english: Look, Kuro. /Goldfish are swimming in the pool.

japanese: 話をきく/見逃す/怒る
english: Listen/ Overlook/ Get angry

japanese: 誰の!c01単位!c07を強奪しますか？
english: Whose !c01Credits!c07 will you steal?

japanese: 誰の!c03潜在能力!c07を下げますか？
english: Whose !c03Potential!c07 will you lower?

japanese: 調子にのって、/その子に、ヘンなことするんじゃないよ！
english: Don't get carried away /and do weird things to that kid!

japanese: 部室にしまいに行こうかと思ったんだが、/ちょっと忙しくてな……。
english: Was thinking of putting it in the club room, but /got a bit busy...

japanese: 誰の!c03根性!c07を下げますか？
english: Whose !c03GUTS!c07 will you lower?

japanese: 誰の!c03知力!c07を下げますか？
english: Whose !c03INT!c07 will you lower?

japanese: 赤い顔して、何いってんだ？
english: Red face, what are you saying?

japanese: 赤い顔して、何いってんの？
english: Red face, what are you saying?

japanese: 遠慮する/自分で直す/直してもらう
english: Decline/ Fix yourself/ Have it fixed

japanese: 部室棟の方に、/お化け屋敷がありましたよ。/そこに行ってみましょう！
english: In the club room building, /there's a haunted house. /Let's go there!

japanese: 行くんだろ？/キャンプファイアーにさ！
english: You're going, right? /To the campfire!

japanese: 行くんでしょ？/キャンプファイアーに！
english: You're going, right? /To the campfire!

japanese: 衣装がどうしたのよ？
english: What about the costume?

japanese: 誰と戦いますか？
english: Who will you fight?

japanese: 英雄先生！/俺に先生のツープラトン技を/伝授してください！
english: Eiyu-sensei! /Please teach me your Two-Platoon technique!

japanese: 英雄先生！/私に先生のツープラトン技を/伝授してください！
english: Eiyu-sensei! /Please teach me your Two-Platoon technique!

japanese: 行こう！/待ってて、/私のライバル達！！
english: Let's go! /Wait for me, /my rivals!!

japanese: 見てみろよ、九郎。/プールに金魚が泳いでるぞ。
english: Look, Kuro. /Goldfish are swimming in the pool.

japanese: 言ったよ。/言った言った。/フフフ……。
english: I said it. /Said it said it. /Hehehe...

japanese: 診察してあげる！
english: I'll examine you!

japanese: 誰に対する!c05友好度!c07を下げますか？
english: Whose !c05Friendship!c07 will you lower?

japanese: 誰の!c03体力!c07を下げますか？
english: Whose !c03HP!c07 will you lower?

japanese: 誰の!c03攻撃力!c07を下げますか？
english: Whose !c03ATK!c07 will you lower?

japanese: 誰の!c03防御力!c07を下げますか？
english: Whose !c03DEF!c07 will you lower?

japanese: 誰の!c04機嫌!c07を直しますか？
english: Whose !c04mood!c07 will you fix?

japanese: 部室棟の方に、/お化け屋敷がありましたよ。/行ってみましょうよ！
english: In the club room building, /there's a haunted house. /Let's go!

japanese: 落ちこんでる暇もないぐらい、/アツい時間が過ごせるさ、きっと……
english: Can spend such hot times /there's no time to be down, surely...

japanese: 衣装がどうしたんだよ？
english: What about the costume?

japanese: 調子にのって、/ベタベタすんじゃないよ！
english: Don't get carried away /and be clingy!

japanese: 退屈な授業がねェと思ったら、/うれしくなっちまってさ！
english: When I think there's no boring classes /I get happy!
